body.name: Broom with Dustpan Combo Set, 2 in 1 Broom and Dustpan Set with Long Handle, Upright 180° Rotating Broom with Brush and Lightwight Dust Pans for Home Kitchen Room Office Lobby Floor Cleaning，White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 17 mins
features: Brooms For Sweeping Indoor: The SUTINE house broom has 5 rows of premium PET bristles and a silicone squeegee that effectively captures fine dust and removes water spots, ensuring your floors are spotless. This broom and dustpan won't harm your floors, making it ideal for cleaning marble, tile, hardwood floors and other surfaces.

Efficient Cleaning Broom with Standing Dustpan: The kitchen broom and dustpan set come with stainless steel handle to ensure durability and a comfortable grip. The widened broom head can be rotated 180° for easy cleaning under beds, tables, or other blind corners. The lip of the long handled dustpan fits seamlessly to the floor, leaving no dust or debris behind and saving you the hassle of daily cleaning.

Collapsible Dust Pan with Handle: This large dust pan with 25 comb-like serrations frees up your hands by easily and efficiently removing pet hair and other debris stuck to the broom. Lock the indoor broom and dustpan together by the buckle, making it easy to store the broom with dustpan combo set in the corner or closet, ready to use.

Adjustable Long Handled Dustpan and Brush Set: Heavy duty broom and dustpan set comes with a 6-section stainless steel extension pole, which allows you to adjust the length of the broom to your preference, suitable for both children and adults. 50 inches of the broom is long enough to never have to bend over to sweep the floor again. Protect your lumbar spine.

Versatile Use: The broom and dustpan set comes with a mini broom dustpan, ideal for home and office cleaning tasks, suitable for sweeping up crumbs, debris, dust, dirt, hair and pet hair. The complimentary small dustpan and brush set helps with table, desk and keyboard cleaning. If you have any questions about our products and services, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple broom/dust pan set
reviews.reviewText: First gave it 4 stars for no directions at all, thankfully it very simple to figure out. It’s a basic set but comes with all you need to get at one time. Comes with a nice broom that sweeps well. Really like the dust pan with the bristles on it to help keep the trash on the floor in the pan when sweeping in it. Also comes with a tiny brush and dust pan for picking up smaller messes. I use the small dust pan and brush for cleaning around my cats litter box when they kick litter out the box. So far it’s all working great. Simple set that gives you all you need with one purchase at least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great broom and dust pan sets
reviews.reviewText: I’m very pleased with these two broom and dust pan sets!! It is very easy to assemble or disassemble if needed, the dust pan folds for easy storage and easy to use. I do wish the bristles were a little more stiff and not as flimsy but I think over time they will get less flimsy like all my other brooms I’ve had. I would definitely get again and recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight broom and dustpan
reviews.reviewText: The dustpan is nice, and I like the fact that the set snaps together for storage. I wish it came with a diagram to put the pieces together. It's pretty straightforward, and most pieces only go in one way. But the plastic parts confused me until I looked at the pictures on the site.The broom is small and doesn't have a wide group of bristles so it's average at sweeping. But I like that it stores away easily and doesn't take up a lot of room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A very nice broom and dustpan set
reviews.reviewText: Mine unit didn’t come with instructions, but it is easy enough to figure out what goes where. When folded and standing upright, you can store this in a tight space. Very nice design.The bristles are soft and durable. The Sweeper cleaning teeth on the dustpan is a very good idea.Haven’t had the chance to use the rubber scraper on the broom but I am sure it will come in handy.The extra mini broom set is cute. Overall a very nice broom and dustpan set. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well! Requires assembly.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice broom and dustpan set. Who knew you would have to put it together...without instructions included! With that said, I figured it out fairly quickly! I like the long broom handle and dustpan - eliminates the need to bend over all the time! It works well!
